Key Match Events: Jose Quintana pitched another gem for the Mets in the NLDS, holding the Phillies to one unearned run in five innings.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jose Quintana has not allowed an earned run in three consecutive postseason starts, tied for the second-longest such streak in postseason history.
Others: Mark Vientos misplayed a chopper, allowing runners to score in the fourth inning.
